title: Get a list of OCM content items
description: Get a list of OCM content items that match the query.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to retrieve.

offset.description: Index of the first record to load.

query.description: Query to determine the OCM items to return.

channelToken.description: Channel token of the publish target. A channel token must be provided as either a query parameter or a request header.

widgetId.description: Id of the widget used to call the endpoint
